data.title: OfferDetails
data.text:
About This Offer Welcome to the Jim Hall and Red Mitchell CD Participant Offer as part of the Remembering Jim Hall Project, where it is our pleasure to share Jim's music and life with you through ArtistShareÂ®. As a participant, during the course of this project you will have a unique look into who Jim Hall was as a guitar master and as a person.

We will be sharing interviews with some of Jim's closest friends, family, and neighbors to give you insight into what made Jim so special, his sincerity and willingness to listen. Many of Jim's fans have their own stories about meeting Jim and we invite you to share your story with us. At the end of the project you will receive a CD with previously unreleased live recordings of Jim Hall and Red Mitchell

We hope that you will join us in celebrating Jim Hall's music and life as a Jim Hall and Red Mitchell Duo CD Participant.

Valse Hot - Sweet Basil 1978

Guitar - Jim Hall

Upright Bass - Red Mitchell

Produced by Brian Camelio and John Snyder

Engineered by David Baker and Chip Stokes

Mastered by Greg Calbi at Sterling Sound

Recorded live at Sweet Basil, NYC on January 18th and 19th, 1978
